name: Set-Azure-AD-Application-KeyRotator
friendlyName: Set Azure AD Application Key Rotator
description: Set Azure AD Application Key Rotator
author: Ralph Jansen
instanceNameFormat: Set Azure AD Application Key Rotator

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running PowerShell.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Resource Group to deploy the rotator to.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the Resource Group

inputs.name: keyVaultName
inputs.label: Key Vault Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Azure Key Vault where the secrets are stored.

inputs.name: schedule
inputs.label: Rotation schedule
inputs.helpMarkDown: A CRON expression for the schedule to rotate all the keys. See in example the following documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/nl-nl/azure/azure-functions/functions-bindings-timer#cron-expressions

inputs.name: defaultKeyName
inputs.label: Default Key name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the key in the app registration. A number will be added to the end of the name for better debugging.

inputs.name: keyDurationInMinutes
inputs.label: Key duration minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of minutes that a rotated key is valid. Make sure that a rotated key is longer valid than the timer schedule otherwise you will end up with app registrations that has no active keys.

inputs.name: createApplicationInsights
inputs.label: Create Application Insights
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create Application Insights instance for debugging the rotator.

outputVariables.name: ResourceGroupName
outputVariables.description: The name of the Resource Group where all the resources are stored.

outputVariables.name: ApplicationKeyRotatorName
outputVariables.description: The name of the Key Rotator function app.

outputVariables.name: KeyVaultName
outputVariables.description: The name of the Key Vault connected to the rotator.

outputVariables.name: ApplicationInsightsName
outputVariables.description: The name of the application insights connected to the Key Rotator.

outputVariables.name: ApplicationInsightsInstrumentationKey
outputVariables.description: The Instrumentation key of the application insights connected to the Key Rotator.
